properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 2 at 9:45PM MST until February 3 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 to 48
mph expected. Winds becoming westerly by mid day Monday.

* WHERE...Southeast Utah and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of light snow showers is likely
to combine with these strong winds Monday.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart
disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay
indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion
due to wind-blown dust.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST MONDAY
